column4: hey, my ndiswrappered card is not working, i check dmesg and got the following error, any advice? http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org/13617/
broadcom chipsets? take a look here http://bcm43xx.berlios.de/?go=devices
Latest stable ndiswrapper is 1.41, get it from source, and compile it yourself
